Simon Cowell said it was impossible to predict whether the show would be as big a success in the U.S. as it has been in Britain and the 15 other nations where it gets No. 1 ratings. All you can do is to give it a 110 per cent effort and do everything to make it the best show you possibly can, he said. He said he was encouraged by the continuing success- even without him- of top-rated Idol, along with other series like America's Got Talent and Dancing with the Stars.
